Articles.Content:
Here is another one of my big aircrafts, 65 meters wide and 66 meters long. My idea was to build the perfect heavy bomber for long range bombing missions.

The aircraft flyes really well for its size, aka it can do loop de loops and fly upside down without any trouble when its flying without load .

It also has a high top speed.

NOTE: i highly suggest you fly this with unbreakable joints on (ALT F12) since the wings flex quite a bit.

Here are some picks of it

Up and down and all around or something like that .

Looks a lot like a bird in the shot above.

So there you have it, a bomber that performs better than expected. I hope you enjoy it .

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/k2bt1dufsyiicu5/KHB-505%20Shockwave%20%28flagless%29.craft?dl=0
